description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Lyra Christi: hymns and verses on the life, work, and sayings of our blessed Lord; with other poems, etc" Author: FORD, Charles Lawrence. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11652.g.21." Page: 44 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1874 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001267538 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
